amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for carrying out EPAs Endangerment Finding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 139 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds for carrying out EPAs Endangerment Finding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 254 (Roll no. 383).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 254 (Roll no. 383).
